name: Bakery
description: Simon's is truly one of those great restaurant/bakeries that is from a by gone era. Our bakery offers an extensive line of homemade baked goods that are still made from scratch are and baked in our own ovens.From our homemade rolls and donuts to a wide variety of delicious pies, cakes,yogurt and pudding, we have a reputation for having the best bakery in the area for almost 3 decades.
